text:
Europa League
Vitoria Guimaraes - Arsenal: which channel and what time?
For the 4th day of Europa League, Arsenal moves on the lawn of Vitoria Guimaraes. A meeting to follow live and in full on French television. On which channel and at what time? Answer in this article.
06 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Hugo Deloraine



ArsenalAn unfortunate finalist of the last Europa League, the Arsenal Gunners will again try their luck in the second European competition. And find the Champions League through the championship.Icon Sport



Bernd LenoIcon Sport



Nacho MonrealIcon Sport



Shkodran MustafiIcon Sport



Sokratis PapastathopoulosIcon Sport



Ainsley Maitland-NilesIcon Sport



Granite XhakaIcon Sport



Lucas TorreiraIcon Sport



Mesut √ñzilIcon Sport



Pierre-Emerick AubameyangIcon Sport



Alexandre LacazetteIcon Sport



Alex IwobiIcon Sport

Arsenal: the possible eleven of the season




Author of a faultless since the beginning of this European campaign, Arsenal will want to continue its momentum on Wednesday. They face Guimaraes, the last in this Group F Europa League and who has lost all these games since the beginning of the competition. In the last match, Arsenal had won 3-2 thanks to a free-kick double from Nicolas Pepe. The match will take place at Afonso Henriques stadium.







The F group calendar





+12 üì∑
Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Frankfurt 0-3 Arsenal

2nd day:

3rd day:

Arsenal 3-2 Vitoria SC

4th day: 06/11/2019 at 16h50 and 07/11/2019 at 18h55

Cork Standard - Frankfurt

5th day: 28/11/2019 at 21:00

Arsenal - Frankfurt

6th day: 12/12/2019 at 18:55

Vitoria Guimaraes Arsenal on which channel?





+12 üì∑
Credit Photo - Icon Sport


This match of the 4th day of Group F Europa League between Vitoria Guimaraes is to be followed live on French television this Wednesday, November 6, 2019, from 16:50, French time, on the channel RMC Sport 2.
